table.title: Failed Logins by IP Address
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-iis sc_status=401 sc_win32_status!=2148074254 | top c_ip | eval percent=round(percent,2) | rename c_ip as "IP Address"

table.title: Failed Logins by Location
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-iis sc_status=401 sc_win32_status!=2148074254 | lookup offices c_ip OUTPUT office | eval office=if(isnull(office),"Unknown",office) | top office | eval percent=round(percent,2) | rename office as "Location"
